The referenced launch file contents:
"org.eclipse.jdt.launching.PROJECT_ATTR" value="Test"/>
    <stringAttribute key="org.eclipse.debug.ui.target_run_perspective" 
value="org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugPerspective"/>
</launchConfiguration>
Looks like a corrupt launch config file.

Error condition was handled as intended (i.e. logged an error message, and was 
removed from workspace cache). Marking as invalid, as this is the expected 
behavior when there is a corrupt file. If we can find the source of corruption, 
re-open.
